human_maps_10kb <- fread("real_data_maps/maps_10kb_models.csv.gz") %>%
                   filter(., mut_map!="uniform") %>%
                   dplyr::select(-c(bin_100kb, bin_1Mb))
  
for(u in unique(human_maps_10kb$mut_map)) {
  Sys.time()
  
  cat(paste("fitting SEM(s) -- ", u, sep=""))
  cat("\n")

  for(m in unique(human_maps_10kb$constrained_model)) { 
    for(d in unique(human_maps_10kb$demo)) {
      
      tbl_10kb <- filter(human_maps_10kb,
                         coverage > 0.75,
                         mut_map==u,
                         constrained_model==m,
                         demo==d) %>%
                         dplyr::select(., -starts_with("bin_")) 
      
      tbl_10kb_log <- cbind.data.frame(tbl_10kb[,1:3],
                        apply(tbl_10kb[,4:(ncol(tbl_10kb)-4)], 2, log))
      
      # because of 0's
      if(any(tbl_10kb$prop_del_sites==0)) {
        tbl_10kb_log$prop_del_sites <- log1p(tbl_10kb$prop_del_sites) 
      } else {
        tbl_10kb_log$prop_del_sites <- log(tbl_10kb$prop_del_sites) 
      }
      
      # genome-wide models
      model_0 <- "
      avg_pi ~ start(0.25)*c1*avg_mut
      avg_pi ~ start(0.5)*c2*B
      B ~ start(-0.25)*c3*avg_mut
      "
      
      m0gls <- sem(model_0,
                   data=tbl_10kb_log,
                   fixed.x=F,
                   std.ov=T,
                   std.lv=T,
                   group="chrom",
                   estimator="GLS")
      
      fwrite(rbind.data.frame(names(unlist(inspect(m0gls, "r2"))),
                              as.numeric(unlist(inspect(m0gls, "r2")))), 
             paste("real_data_maps/lavaan_out/YRI_DAG0_r2_10kb_genomewide_", 
                   d, "_", m, "_", u, ".csv", sep=""),
             col.names=F)
  
      fwrite(parameterestimates(m0gls, ci=T), 
             paste("real_data_maps/lavaan_out/YRI_DAG0_params_10kb_genomewide_", 
                   d, "_", m, "_", u, ".csv", sep=""))
      
      fwrite(rbind.data.frame(names(fitMeasures(m0gls)),
                              as.numeric(fitMeasures(m0gls))), 
             paste("real_data_maps/lavaan_out/YRI_DAG0_fitmeasures_10kb_genomewide_", 
                   d, "_", m, "_", u, ".csv", sep=""),
             col.names=F)
      
      model_1 <- "

      avg_pi ~ start(0.5)*c2*B
      avg_pi ~ start(-0.25)*c3*prop_del_sites

             col.names=F)
  
      fwrite(parameterestimates(m1gls, ci=T),

mut_maps_1kb <- cbind.data.frame(roulette_1kb,
                                 carlson_1kb[,4:ncol(carlson_1kb)],
                                 gnomad_1kb[,4:ncol(gnomad_1kb)])

mut_maps_1kb <- mut_maps_1kb %>% group_by(chrom) %>% 
                                 mutate(bin_10kb=(1:n() - 1) %/% 10,
                                        bin_100kb=(1:n() - 1) %/% 100,
                                        bin_1Mb=(1:n() - 1) %/% 1000)

mut_maps_10kb <- mut_maps_1kb %>%
                 group_by(chrom, bin_10kb) %>% 
                 mutate(mean_mut_roulette=mean(avg_mut_roulette, na.rm=T),
                        mean_mut_masked_roulette=mean(avg_mut_masked_roulette, na.rm=T),
                        mean_mut_carlson=mean(avg_mut_carlson, na.rm=T),
                        mean_mut_masked_carlson=mean(avg_mut_masked_carlson, na.rm=T),
                        mean_mut_gnomad=mean(avg_mut_gnomad, na.rm=T),
                        mean_mut_masked_gnomad=mean(avg_mut_masked_gnomad, na.rm=T),
                        sum_sites_roulette=sum(num_sites_roulette, na.rm=T),
                        sum_sites_masked_roulette=sum(num_sites_masked_roulette, na.rm=T),
                        sum_sites_carlson=sum(num_sites_carlson, na.rm=T),
                        sum_sites_masked_carlson=sum(num_sites_masked_carlson, na.rm=T),
                        sum_sites_gnomad=sum(num_sites_gnomad, na.rm=T),
                        sum_sites_masked_gnomad=sum(num_sites_masked_gnomad, na.rm=T),
                        chromStart=min(chromStart),
                        chromEnd=max(chromEnd)) %>%
                 distinct(bin_10kb, .keep_all=T) %>%
                 ungroup() %>%
                 dplyr::select(., c(chrom, chromStart, chromEnd, 
                                    mean_mut_roulette,
                                    mean_mut_masked_roulette,

  tbl_10kb$avg_pi <- log(tbl_10kb$avg_pi)
  
  # because of 0's
  if(any(tbl_10kb$prop_del_sites==0)) {
    tbl_10kb$prop_del_sites <- log1p(tbl_10kb$prop_del_sites) 
  } else {

  }
